defect.title: Include statement not case consistent in messaging_mmssettings

relnotes.defect: Changed according to the Symbian OS source classifications policy.

defect.title: SMS test fails setting and obtaining smssetting for hotswap functionality

relnotes.defect: Changed according to the filename case check policy.

defect.title: Filename case issues cause build failure on Linux with Raptor

relnotes.defect: Updating bld.inf file by changing uppsercase names to lowercase

deliverystep.name: Messaging: Unicode / Binary encoding for SMS in SendAs

relnotes.defect: New test step written to switch off test phone.
These files missed during submission for DEF113315 (008).
Fix was to write new Test step for unloading phone module and to reset RProperty. All the tests are related to Simtsy This fix is implemented for EmailOverSms tests

The test expects to fail with -46, for a particular but since there is a change in behavior due to 1678, the test will not fail with -46, Fix was to write the new script copied from Cap_SendMtmCommandFail.Script and exclusion this failing test, and export this instead of old Cap_SendMtmCommandFail.script and this new script will be exported from 9.5 onwords.
Fix was to change the loging message."Test Expected to Fail and Fails" is the new change for "Test Expected to Pass and Passes"

defect.title: PREQ1678: Some sendas tests are failing because of use SetUserPromptResponse

relnotes.defect: Fix for SendAs failing tests because of SetUserPromptResponse utility unavailability in 9.4

deliverystep.name: Implemented user prompting while sending/recieving the messages
Messaging file name changes to support GNU compiler for Linux
